name: crs-data
description: Coordinate Reference System Information (PROJ4 String, ESRI WKT, and OGC WKT)

scripts.build: cd scripts && node step-1-download-json.js && node step-2-process-json.js && node step-3-convert-json-to-code.js && node step-4-mod-code.js && cp data/proj-mod.js ../proj-data.js

author: Daniel J. Dufour
